data.title: STARLIMS integrated with EMC Documentum
data.meta_description: STARLIMS has signed an OEM agreement with EMC in which STARLIMS will embed EMC Documentum technology to provide a content management system in Version 10 of STARLIMS
data.text:
STARLIMS Corporation has announced an OEM agreement with EMC in which STARLIMS will embed EMC Documentum technology. The resulting solution, called STARLIMS Content Manager, will integrate LIMS, Scientific Data Management System (SDMS) and Electronic Laboratory Notebook (ELN) functionalities into a single platform.

As part the companyâ€™s new relationship with EMC, STARLIMS has also joined the EMC Documentum Application Developer Program, giving STARLIMS design consultation and guidance and access to dedicated Documentum technical resources.
